channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2361] Really, ladies?...Really?! (PIC)
[+2327] New Version of Digg Revealed
item.description: At the “Bigg Digg Shindigg” event at the South by Southwest Interactive Conference (SXSWi), Digg CEO Jay Adelson revealed that the popular social bookmarking site is getting a major overhaul, teasing the audience about new features such as personalized feeds and the return of the Digg leaderboard.

item.title: [+2068] Leo Laporte crowd surfing while live streaming @ Diggnation
item.description: Leo Laporte crowd surfing while live streaming on the Internet at Diggnation Live case. As seen at SXSW 2010 at Stubbs BBQ in Austin, TX!

item.description: And look at that purple suit...

item.title: [+1567] Obama Sides with RIAA, MPAA; Backs ACTA
item.description: No copyright and/or patent reform for you, American citizens!

item.title: [+1216] Texas Textbook MASSACRE: 'Madrassa's Texas Style
item.description: Ultra Conservatives approve radical changes in Textbooks that will be used by millions of students in the coming decade. Cutting out Thomas Jefferson and William Jefferson Clinton from the History pages and inserting Religious figures instead.

item.title: [+973] My New Teeth Cleaner (pic)
[+969] Mario Toast! (pic)
[+953] Man Kills Burglar with Ornamental Sword
item.description: A 29-year-old man arrived home at his Pennsylvania flat and immediately noticed something wrong. His dog was acting strangely, and he heard a noise coming from the apartment. So he grabbed an ornamental sword from the wall...

item.title: [+889] Genius Promotion Campaign : IKEA Subway Display in Paris
item.description: From 10 to 24 March 2010, IKEA develops an interesting event in four important metro stations in Paris. Furniture collections are currently displayed in high-traffic spots, giving the potential customers a chance to interact with the brand by checking out the products.

item.title: [+865] Pi Day: Google Doodle Celebrates Math Nerds Everywhere
item.description: Google’s new logo, which you can see on the top right, contains not only the famous πr2 formula, but five other uses of π: measuring the volume of a sphere (V = 4⁄3 πr3), computing the circumference of a circle (C = 2πr), measuring the volume of a cylinder (V = πr2h), Archimedes’ calculation of Pi (223/71 < π < 22/7), and even the ...

item.title: [+797] The New Rove-Cheney Assault On Reality
item.description: The revisionist history peddled by Liz Cheney and Karl Rove must be aggressively refuted, and we must remember who really failed to keep America safe.

item.title: [+752] Things Get Ugly Between Agassi And Sampras (VIDEO)
item.description: Andre Agassi is kind of an ass

item.title: [+739] 50 Best Video Game Weapons of All-Time
item.description: It's vital for a hard-hitting action game to have appropriately powerful guns, but it's also important to have weapons that are fun to wield, require in-depth strategy to use, and don't look and act like the same old thing from every other game.

item.title: [+610] Invasion Of The Teddy Bears (Video)
[+576] 13 Candies From Our Childhood [Slideshow]
item.description: Long gone but not forgotten, these candies bring back memories.

item.title: [+543] So Many Men!1000's Answer College Girl's Plea For Boyfriend
item.description: She was probably hoping at least one, possible two, might respond. But when a Chinese student posted a message at college saying she wanted a boyfriend, they came in their droves.Instead of looking down from her balcony on a romantic scene as her potential suitor waited below, Zhang Mengqian was confronted with a huge mob.

item.title: [+539] It Was The Cars Fault (PIC)
[+536] How to: Make Potato Chips in the Microwave
item.description: Microwaves have gotten a bad rap with some people because they just don't cook some things as they should be cooked. However, according to Savory Sweet Life, it is possible to make potato chips in the microwave that taste great. Try these out some night for a midnight snack.

item.title: [+522] 10 Reasons Why Jeff Bridges Is Awesome
item.description: From being a devoted dad and husband to mastering his craft, why Jeff Bridges rocks.
